nodes.text:
Ubrikkian Industries was a well-established manufacturer. Its subsidiaries included Ubrikkian Private Shipwrights, Ubrikkian Repulsorlift Manufacturing, Ubrikkian Steamworks, and Ubrikkian Transports. Ubrikkian Industries itself was a subsidiary of Kuat Drive Yards.
The corporation produced sail barges, landspeeders, cloud cars, swoop bikes and skiffs. Ubrikkian was responsible for manufacturing Jabba Desilijic Tiure's sail barge Khetanna and the Imperial HAVr A9 Floating Fortress. These ships were usually manufactured at the Ubrikkian Yards.
During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the factory had to delay the delivery of its new medical droids that were malfunctioning due to a software bug.
